    • Constructor Detail

      • BCLReaderSettings

        public BCLReaderSettings(BCLReaderSettings.BCLReaderColumnMode columnMode,
                         boolean isMediaOverlayTapToPlayEnabled,
                         boolean isTextAlignmentJustified,
                         double marginAmount,
                         double textScale,
                         BCLReaderSettings.BCLReaderTheme theme)
        Parameters:
        columnMode - The column mode.
        isMediaOverlayTapToPlayEnabled - Whether or not tap-to-play is enabled for media overlay.
        isTextAlignmentJustified - Whether or not to have the book justify text (align to the left and right). Enabling this suggests to the book that justification should be used, although some books may ignore this. Disabling this lets the book control text alignment.
        marginAmount - The amount of blank space added to the left and right sides of the reader view. A value of 0.0 causes text to be rendered at its default size. The value must be between 0.0 and 0.6. Values outside this range are clamped.
        textScale - A value that controls the size of text in a book. A value of 100 causes text to be rendered at its default size. Values less than 100 render smaller text, and values greater than 100 render larger text. The value must be between 50 and 400. Values outside this range are clamped.
        theme - The theme.
